admission_text:
#  Hours & Location 

Art is for everyone. Admission is free. Donations are welcome.

## Hours of Operation 

**Monday** | CLOSED  
---|---  
**Tuesday** | CLOSED  
**Wednesday** | 11:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m.  
**Thursday** | 11:00 a.m. - 8:30 p.m.  
**Friday*** | 11:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m.  
**Saturday** | 11:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m.  
**Sunday** | CLOSED  
  
* The gallery will be open 11:00 a.m. - 9:00 p.m. on First Fridays. Please visit <https://www.sarniafirstfriday.com/> for First Friday dates.

## Directions

Judith & Norman Alix Art Gallery  
147 Lochiel Street  
Sarnia, Ontario  
N7T 0B4

## Parking

There are several parking lots and on-street parking within walking distance of the gallery.

Art is for everyone. Admission is free. Donations are welcome.

accessibility_text:
#  Accessibility Plan 

## Content Pull Instructions

1\. In the box below, paste the full URL to the page from which content should be pulled-in.

2\. Click Save. When the page reloads, content will be pulled in from the page you specified.

<https://www.lambtononline.ca/en/county-government/accessibility.aspx>  
---
